<!-- wp:group {"align":"full","layout":{"inherit":false,"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull"><!-- wp:group {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|black"}}},"spacing":{"padding":{"bottom":"120px","top":"60px"}}},"className":"site-header","layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical","justifyContent":"left","flexWrap":"wrap"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group site-header has-link-color" style="padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:120px"><!-- wp:image {"id":32,"width":38,"height":38,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="http://localhost:8888/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/site_title-150x150-1.png" alt="" class="wp-image-32" width="38" height="38"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide"><!-- wp:column {"width":"60%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:60%"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:heading {"level":1,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"80px"}}} -->
<h1 style="font-size:80px">Say Hello to Gutenberg, the WordPress Editor</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Experience the flexibility that blocks allow, whether you’re building your first site or write code for a living.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link">Try Gutenberg today in WordPress</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"30%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:30%"></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"60px"} -->
<div style="height:60px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:group {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"bottom":"60px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group" style="padding-bottom:60px"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-small-font-size"><em>This page was built with blocks — pieces of content, similar to LEGO bricks — that you can move around. <strong>Click around to explore them.</strong></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Gradient-Background.png","id":1194,"hasParallax":true,"dimRatio":10,"isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light has-parallax" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px;background-image:url(https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Gradient-Background.png)"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-10 has-background-dim"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"inherit":false,"wideSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","left":"0px","bottom":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:30px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:image {"id":1208,"width":60,"height":60,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/block-media-texticon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1208" width="60" height="60"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"tertiary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-tertiary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size">Create modern layouts with rich content.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","right":"0px","bottom":"30px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:30px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:image {"id":1214,"width":48,"height":48,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/copyicon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1214" width="48" height="48"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"tertiary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-tertiary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size">Trust that your editor looks like your website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"bottom":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-bottom:30px"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:image {"id":1216,"width":45,"height":45,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/devicesicon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1216" width="45" height="45"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"tertiary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-tertiary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size">Work across screen sizes and devices.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"bottom":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-bottom:30px"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:image {"id":1216,"width":45,"height":45,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/pluginicon.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1216" width="45" height="45"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"tertiary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-tertiary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size">Do more with fewer plugins.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"overlayColor":"background","minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-background-color has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","layout":{"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:columns {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px"><!-- wp:column {"width":"100%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:100%"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}}} -->
<h2 class="alignwide" id="be-your-own-builder" style="font-size:72px">Be your own builder.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":"0px","padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px"><!-- wp:column {"width":"60%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"30px","right":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:30px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;flex-basis:60%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"22px"}}} -->
<p style="font-size:22px">Blocks allow you to build your own custom posts and pages without any coding knowledge. Here’s a selection of the default blocks included with Gutenberg:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"15%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"30px","right":"30px","left":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:30px;padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;flex-basis:15%"></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":"25%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"30px"}}},"layout":{"inherit":false}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-top:30px;flex-basis:25%"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textColor":"primary","width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-primary-color has-text-color" href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/browse/block/">Browse all blocks</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"20px"} -->
<div style="height:20px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1192,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Paragraph.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1192"/><figcaption>Paragraph</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1219,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Heading.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1219"/><figcaption>Heading</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1220,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Media-Text.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1220"/><figcaption>Media &amp; Text</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1221,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Image.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1221"/><figcaption>Image</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1222,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Gallery.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1222"/><figcaption>Gallery</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1223,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Cover-1024x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1223"/><figcaption>Cover</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","right":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1226,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->

<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->

<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1230,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->

<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:image {"id":1231,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/List.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1231"/><figcaption>List</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"customOverlayColor":"#fbfaf7","minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:0px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim" style="background-color:#fbfaf7"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:columns {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns" style="padding-right:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":"53%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-bottom:120px;flex-basis:53%"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}}} -->
<h2 class="alignwide" id="be-your-own-builder" style="font-size:72px">Give your creativity a head start.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"40px"} -->
<div style="height:40px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"22px"}}} -->
<p style="font-size:22px">Beautiful content doesn’t have to be designed from scratch. Patterns are collections of pre-arranged blocks you can assemble to make your content impactful, meaningful and appealing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","flexWrap":"nowrap"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link" href="//wordpress.org/patterns/">Block Pattern Directory</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"0px"}}},"layout":{"type":"flex","flexWrap":"nowrap"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group" style="padding-right:0px"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link" href="https://learn.wordpress.org/lesson-plan/how-to-use-wordpress-block-patterns/">Learn how to create patterns</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"2%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:2%"></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"bottom","width":"55%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom" style="flex-basis:55%"><!-- wp:image {"id":1197,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Mask-Group.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1197"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"overlayColor":"background","isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-background-color has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","layout":{"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}},"textColor":"primary"} -->
<h2 class="alignwide has-primary-color has-text-color" id="gutenberg-everyone" style="font-size:72px">Gutenberg ❤️ everyone</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"60px","right":"0px","left":"0px"}}},"layout":{"inherit":false}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide" style="padding-top:60px;padding-right:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"top","align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","layout":{"inherit":false}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size"><strong>Created by the community.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-right:30px"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color">Built by people from all over the world who work daily, meet weekly, and ship biweekly. You can be a part of it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":""} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textColor":"primary","width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-primary-color has-text-color" href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/handbook/tutorials/navigating-the-community/">Join the WordPress Community</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:separator {"backgroundColor":"primary","className":"alignwide is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-primary-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-primary-background-color has-background alignwide is-style-wide"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"top","align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size"><strong>Built for a great developer experience.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-right:30px"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color">Gutenberg was developed on GitHub using the WordPress REST API, JavaScript, and React.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textColor":"primary","width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-primary-color has-text-color" href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/explanations/architecture/key-concepts/">Browse the documentation</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:separator {"backgroundColor":"primary","className":"alignwide is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-primary-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-primary-background-color has-background alignwide is-style-wide"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"top","align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size"><strong>Designed for compatibility.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-right:30px"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color">We recommend migrating features to blocks, but support previous versions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textColor":"primary","width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-primary-color has-text-color" href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/explanations/faq/#compatibility">Learn more about compatibility</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:separator {"backgroundColor":"primary","className":"alignwide is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-primary-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-primary-background-color has-background alignwide is-style-wide"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"top","align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color has-medium-font-size"><strong>Focused on accessibility.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-right:30px"><!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"primary"} -->
<p class="has-primary-color has-text-color">Designing with and for everyone is at the core of the editor and its future.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-button wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textColor":"primary","width":100,"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-100 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-primary-color has-text-color" href="https://make.wordpress.org/accessibility/">See accessibility improvements</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-button --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"customOverlayColor":"#ecf6fa","minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim" style="background-color:#ecf6fa"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","layout":{"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":"90%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:90%"><!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","layout":{"contentSize":""}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}}} -->
<h2 class="alignwide" id="be-your-own-builder" style="font-size:72px">New to WordPress? </h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}}} -->
<h2 class="alignwide" id="be-your-own-builder" style="font-size:72px">No problem.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"5%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"20px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:20px;flex-basis:5%"><!-- wp:image {"id":53,"width":30,"height":30,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="http://localhost:8888/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/wordpress-1.png" alt="" class="wp-image-53" width="30" height="30"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"bottom","width":"35%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom" style="flex-basis:35%"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-link"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"22px"}}} -->
<p style="font-size:22px">You can learn all the basics on <a href="https://learn.wordpress.org">Learn WordPress</a>, a whole section dedicated to helping you get started. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"5%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:5%"></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"bottom","width":"60%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom" style="flex-basis:60%"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-link"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"36px"}},"textColor":"secondary"} -->
<p class="has-secondary-color has-text-color" style="font-size:36px"><a href="https://learn.wordpress.org/workshop/how-to-install-wordpress/">How to Install WordPress ↗</a><br><a href="https://learn.wordpress.org/workshop/how-to-choose-install-a-theme/">How to Choose and Install a Theme ↗</a><br><a href="https://learn.wordpress.org/workshop/intro-to-block-patterns/">Intro to Block Patterns ↗</a><br><a href="https://learn.wordpress.org/workshop/advanced-layouts-with-the-block-editor/">Advanced Layouts With the Block Editor ↗</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"customOverlayColor":"#fbfaf7","minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","bottom":"120px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light" style="padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim" style="background-color:#fbfaf7"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"top","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px","right":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns are-vertically-aligned-top" style="padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":"90%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:90%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"22px"}}} -->
<p style="font-size:22px">Some more helpful content and places to dig deeper about Gutenberg.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-link"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"36px"}},"textColor":"secondary"} -->
<p class="has-secondary-color has-text-color" style="font-size:36px">
<a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/explanations/faq/">Gutenberg FAQs ↗</a><br>
<a href="https://wordpress.tv/?s=gutenberg">WordPress.tv talks about Gutenberg ↗</a><br>
<a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/contributors/design/#goal-of-gutenberg">Gutenberg Design Principles ↗</a><br>
<a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/wordpress-editor/">WordPress Editor Documentation ↗</a><br>
<a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/05/20/ways-to-keep-up-with-full-site-editing-fse/">Development Updates ↗</a>
</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"top","width":"10%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-top" style="flex-basis:10%"><!-- wp:image {"id":1157,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":["#3858e9","#fbfaf7"]}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/docs.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1157"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Gradient-Background-2-1.png","id":1202,"hasParallax":true,"dimRatio":10,"isDark":false,"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"120px","right":"0px","bottom":"120px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light has-parallax" style="padding-top:120px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:120px;padding-left:0px;background-image:url(https://blockpatterndesigns.mystagingwebsite.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Gradient-Background-2-1.png)"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-10 has-background-dim"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"contentSize":"1000px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:columns {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:column {"width":"100%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"30px","left":"30px"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;flex-basis:100%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"52px","lineHeight":"1.1","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"300"}},"textColor":"tertiary"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-tertiary-color has-text-color" style="font-size:52px;font-style:normal;font-weight:300;line-height:1.1">“Gutenberg meets our challenges and opportunities head on while simultaneously benefitting everyone who makes a living working in the WP ecosystem. It’s about a lot more than just blocks.”</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|tertiary"}}}},"textColor":"tertiary","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-tertiary-color has-text-color has-link-color has-small-font-size"> — MATT MULLENWEG, IN <a href="https://ma.tt/2017/08/we-called-it-gutenberg-for-a-reason/">MA.TT</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover -->

<!-- wp:cover {"customOverlayColor":"#ecf6fa","minHeightUnit":"px","isDark":false,"align":"full"} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull is-light"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-100 has-background-dim" style="background-color:#ecf6fa"></span><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0px","right":"0px","bottom":"0px","left":"0px"}}},"layout":{"inherit":false,"contentSize":"1200px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide" style="padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"72px"}}} -->
<h2 class="alignwide" id="thanks-for-trying-gutenberg" style="font-size:72px">Thanks for trying Gutenberg!</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"inherit":true}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"bottom","align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":"0px"}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignfull are-vertically-aligned-bottom"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"bottom","width":"50%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom" style="flex-basis:50%"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":"70%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:70%"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-link"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-normal-font-size">Gutenberg is available as part of WordPress 5.0 and later. New developments and experiments will continue in the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/gutenberg/">Gutenberg plugin</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"bottom"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-bottom"><!-- wp:group {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"30px"}}},"layout":{"type":"flex","flexWrap":"nowrap","justifyContent":"space-between"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group" style="padding-top:30px"><!-- wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-wporg-gutenberg-link"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"right","fontSize":"normal"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-right has-normal-font-size"><a href="https://twitter.com/WordPress">Twitter ↗<br>
</a><a href="https://github.com/WordPress/gutenberg">GitHub ↗</a>
</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/wporg-gutenberg-link -->
